import '../HomeContents/BoilerBioFuel.css'; function BoilerBioFuel() { return (

What is biofuel-boilers?

Biofuel-boilers are boilers that use biofuel instead of typical boilers that use fossil fuels (such as petroleum). Biofuel is a "clean" liquid fuel obtained from renewable sources, in particular vegetables oils, animal fats, cooking oils and plants.

How can it help your business?

Biofuel-boilers are powered by renewable energy, biomass that can reduce your business dependence on fossil fuels and as there are lot of rumours that the fossil fuels will run out in this century, it is a good idea to convert to renewable energy because soon the prices will go up and it will increase your business expenses.
In today society where climate is a hot topic, becoming green can be an opportunity to advertise yourself as green business and get more customers. It will benefit your business significantly because carbon free business is seen as an eco-friendly business that everyone likes and prefers over a business that has high carbon emissions.
Moreover, it has lot of financial benefits such as there are lot of government subsidies that are made purposely to encourage everyone the installation of biofuel boilers and install green technologies.

) } export default BoilerBioFuel;
